about_the_game:
[Slayer - the demon haunted world]
The demo version differs from the full version in terms of the number of stages and items. Other than that, it’s similar to the full version.

In a word

If Nintendo creates a Soul-like game, I think it is .

 

Brief Story
After the glorious era ended, a new age began.
Historians called this the “Era of Ash and Dust.”
The Slayer enters the tower to save the world.

The game is easy to pick up but hard to master.
With intuitive game design, players can jump in without prior knowledge.
However, quick judgment and deep strategy are required.

◆ Unique Graphics
Featuring distinctive dot graphics that cross the boundary between pixel art and 3D, offering a familiar yet fresh visual experience.

◆ Unique Combat
It may look cute, but the combat requires strategic control!
Anyone can play with simple controls, but sharp judgment and meticulous strategy are needed. Overcome limited movement and rotation, explore dungeons, and survive intense battles. Be prepared for tense moments when enemies suddenly appear right beside you.

◆ Player Growth and Skills
Explore dungeons, earn points in fierce battles, and enhance your abilities. As you grow, you’ll unlock more diverse and powerful skills. Progress through increasingly intense combat by leveling up.

◆ Various Items and Shops
Discover weapons, potions, and coins during battles!
Open treasure chests hidden throughout the dungeon to acquire valuable items. Use the coins you've collected to purchase various items in the shop and gain an edge in combat.

◆ Different Dungeon Tiles and Gimmicks
As you delve deeper into the dungeon, you’ll encounter new tiles. Learn the characteristics of the tiles to advance. You must avoid traps and incoming obstacles scattered throughout the dungeon. Solve hidden puzzle elements in each dungeon to move forward.

◆ Battle with Powerful Bosses
At the end of the dungeon, you'll face powerful bosses with various battle patterns and strong attacks. A careless move can lead to devastating consequences. You’ll need to use all your strategies and skills, as well as the items you’ve gathered, to defeat the boss.
